alto:TextBlock.alto:String: NEWS SPIA strengthens its commitment to providing students with public service careers SPIA Career Day in 2023. Ryland Graham / The Daily Princetonian Listen to this article The School of Public and International Affairs (SPIA) hosted its second annual “Undergraduate Policy Day in Washington” trip to its Washington headquarters on Sept. 27 — the latest in an informal push against the Princeton-to-private-sector pipeline. Since the start of the semester, SPIA has held a series of events and programs promoting careers in public service. Eojin Park October 28, 2024 | 12:31am EDT 3/11/25, 12:15 AM SPIA strengthens its commitment to providing students with public service careers - The Princetonian https://www.dailyprincetonian.com/article/2024/10/princeton-news-stlife-spia-commitment-public-service-opportunities 1/3
